lines.line: Ah yes, it was something I neglected to mention.

When you go through the door, your soul is tethered between this time and that one. As you suffer damage that tether weakens, and eventually snaps you back here. You are revitalized in the process by my power.
How kind of you. Do I get to go back?
The door will be there for as long as you require, Orion.
Isovios. As a part of passing some of my power unto you, the sword has new... capabilities. It can help to make you stronger.
